goals__remit:
Founded in Newcastle, Sage is the UK’s largest tech company, helping over three million businesses manage everything from money to people. Today we have 13,000 colleagues and operate in 23 markets. 
 
Using intuitive and flexible, cloud-enabled software, we strive to make our customers - from start-ups to scale-ups and corporates - more productive by tackling the administrative burdens holding them back. We do this by examining the causes of low productivity, digitising administrative processes, driving digital adoption and applying emerging technology in an ethical way. 
 
When entrepreneurs and SMEs do well we do but their voice is not always heard by Governments. Sage has a Government Relations function with the overriding objectives of: 
 
•    Unlocking potential for ambitious businesses 
•    Removing barriers to growth 
•    Driving adoption of emerging technologies
